biography.bio: Ching Wan Lau was born on February 16, 1964 in Hong Kong. He is an actor, known for Mad detective (2007), La vie sans principe (2011) and Black Mask (1996). He has been married to Amy Kwok since 1998.
biography.name: Ching Wan Lau

biography.bio: Yuen-Wah Lee is an actress, known for Wei, wen bian wei? (1994), Big Bad Sis (1976) and The Master Strikes Back (1985).
biography.name: Yuen-Wah Lee

biography.bio: Alexander Chan was born in 1957 in Hong Kong. He is an actor and assistant director, known for Infernal Affairs II (2003), One Nite in Mongkok (2004) and Double Tap (2000).
biography.name: Alexander Chan

biography.bio: Ellen Chan was born on February 16, 1966 in Hong Kong, China. She is an actress, known for Exilé (2006), Nan yang shi da xie shu (1995) and Wei qing (1993).
biography.name: Ellen Chan

biography.bio: Lung Chan is known for his work on Snake in the Eagle's Shadow (1978), First Mission (1985) and Spooky Encounters (1980).
biography.name: Lung Chan

biography.bio: Teddy Chan is an actor and director, known for Kung Fu Killer (2014), Bodyguards & Assassins (2009) and Espion amateur (2001).
biography.name: Teddy Chan

biography.bio: Wai-Ling Chan is an actress, known for Embrace Your Shadow (2005), Wei, wen bian wei? (1994) and Huai hai zi ju le bu (1995).
biography.name: Wai-Ling Chan

biography.bio: Billy Sau Yat Ching is known for his work on Project A 2 (1987), Dream Lovers (1986) and Sheng si xian (1985).
biography.name: Billy Sau Yat Ching

biography.bio: James Jim-Si Ha is known for his work on Crime story (1993), The Eight Immortals Restaurant: The Untold Story (1993) and Somebody to Love (2009).
biography.name: James Jim-Si Ha

biography.placeOfBirth: Kowloon City, Hong Kong, British Crown Colony
biography.bio: Ka-Kui Ho was born on March 14, 1951 in Kowloon City, Hong Kong, British Crown Colony. He is known for his work on Riki-Oh: The Story of Ricky (1991), Prison on Fire (1987) and La secte du lotus blanc (1992). He died on January 27, 2015 in Hong Kong.
biography.name: Ka-Kui Ho

biography.bio: Pui Hui is an actress, known for Emotional Girl (1993), Wei, wen bian wei? (1994) and Mo deng long zheng hu dou (1994).
biography.name: Pui Hui

biography.bio: Chung Kwai is an actor, known for Robotrix (1991), Gangs' 92 (1992) and Wei, wen bian wei? (1994).
biography.name: Chung Kwai

biography.bio: Gwan Joh Law is an actor, known for Kai xin gui 5 shang cuo shen (1991), Biu je, nei fan ye! (1991) and Wei, wen bian wei? (1994).
biography.name: Gwan Joh Law

biography.bio: Helena Law Lan had never married, and her actual name is "LO Yin Ying", but her stage name is "Law Lan", after the Cantonese pronunciation of Sophia Loren's last name. Her family used to be fairly well-off, because her father was a soap merchant who supplied to major hotels in Hong Kong, and the family employed a number of servants at home. However, they lost everything during World War II. Hence she lives simply, and believes that money should be spent wisely and effectively. Despite her age (73 in 2009), she spends a lot of time doing volunteer work, e.g. helping at old people's homes. She has a big sister, six nephews and nieces, and a number of grand-nephews and nieces. During festivals, she has gatherings at her sister's home.
biography.name: Lan Law

biography.bio: Wai-Si Lee is an actress, known for Wan choi tung ji (1994), Bomb Disposal Officer: Baby Bomb (1994) and Wei, wen bian wei? (1994).
biography.name: Wai-Si Lee
